speaker: Lynette
mark: ease up 减轻, 轻点

speaker: Mrs. Huber
content: Lynette, I've been looking all over for you. Are you aware of what your sons are doing?
mark: all over 到处都是；遍布全身 look all over for you
Are you aware of 你是否意识到... Are you aware that

speaker: Lynette
content: Stop! What are you doing? We are at a wake.
mark: wake v. 唤醒，醒来；唤起，激起；守夜，为……守灵 n.（葬礼前后的）守夜，守灵；

speaker: Kid
content: When we got here, You said we could go in the pool.

speaker: Lynette
content: I said you could go by the pool. Do you have your swimsuits on?
mark: have clothes on 表示 “穿着衣服”，强调身上有衣物穿着的状态。

speaker: Kid
content: Yeah, we put them on under our clothes just before we left.
mark: have clothes on 表示 “穿着衣服”，强调身上有衣物穿着的状态。

speaker: Lynette
content: You three planned this? All right. That's it. Get out. I am your mother. You have to do what I say. Come on.

speaker: Kid
content: We wanna swim and you can't stop us!

speaker: Lynette
content: Think I won't get in this pool and just grab you? Get out! Get over here.
mark: get over here 到这里来

speaker: Lynette
content: Paul, we have to leave now. Once again, I am so sorry for your loss.

speaker: Alice
content: Lynette shouldn't have been so concerned about my husband.
mark: be concerned about 关心；担忧；挂念

speaker: Alice
content: He had other things on his mind. Things below the surface.
mark: on his mind 某人心里惦记着、牵挂着、担心着的事情 exist in one's mind（存在于某人的脑海中）
in his mind 在某人的脑海里、在某人的思维之中 form in one's mind（在某人脑海中形成）
I had other things on my mind.
below the surface 在表面之下
